name: DarkMaze (itch)
description:
A game made in Global Game Jam 2018, By Bisher Dokkmak, Monir Shembesh and Darren Goh Zhe Yow.

Dark Maze is a fast based time attack action puzzle game. Try to find out your way out of the maze as fast as possible using bombs that lights up your path and utilising the time stop power ups laying around. However, be carful you must not be noticed by the monsters or else! Trial and error.. memorise your path!! Hint: Use a controller ;)
